summary: This document is an email chain from October 2021 between FBI personnel and a forensic accountant regarding the sharing of financial account documents related to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss uploading account statements where Ghislaine Maxwell was a signer to a shared file exchange site.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as a signer on the Epstein accounts that are the subject of the document request.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; the accounts in question are his.

connections.description: Maxwell was a signer on Epstein's financial accounts, indicating a financial and likely operational connection.

events.title: Forensic Accountant compiles Epstein account documents
events.description: A forensic accountant at the FBI New York Field Office compiles documents related to Epstein accounts where Ghislaine Maxwell was a signer.

events.title: Account statements uploaded to shared site
events.description: Account statements are uploaded to a shared file exchange site for review by the FBI team.

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: The document is a 2021 email chain showing ongoing FBI investigation into Epstein's financial accounts.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as a signer on Jeffrey Epstein's financial accounts.
A forensic accountant at the FBI New York Field Office compiled the relevant account documents.
The emails coordinate the secure sharing of these financial documents via a file exchange site.
